metadata.title: USN-5430-1 -- GNOME Settings vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNOME Settings incorrectly handled the remote desktop sharing configuration. When turning off desktop sharing, it may be turned on again after rebooting, contrary to expectations.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5430-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gnome-control-center - 1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2 gnome-control-center-dev - 1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2 gnome-control-center-faces - 1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2 gnome-control-center-data - 1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2 No subscription required
